H3.text: who sang the song should have been a cowboy. Toby Keith

A4.text: Keith released his chart-topping debut single, 'Should've Been a Cowboy', in 1993.

A5.text: Keith's debut single, 'Should've Been a Cowboy', went to number one on the U.S. Billboard Hot Country Songs chart in 1993.
